snippet: The French food company Danone said it was cutting its sales, profitability and free cash flow goals for 2013 as a result.
lead_paragraph: The French food company Danone said it was cutting its sales, profitability and free cash flow goals for 2013 as a result.

headline.main: Slow Recovery From Recall Hurts Danone
headline.print_headline: Slow Recovery From Recall Hurts Danone Shares
